tit.e: Fukami-toge Pass (a pass separating Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City and Nantan City)
Fukami-toge Pass (a pass separating Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City and Nantan City)

sen.j: 深見峠（ふかみとうげ）は、京都府京都市右京区と同府南丹市を隔てる峠である。
sen.e: Fukami-toge Pass is a pass that forms a border between Ukyo Ward (Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture) and Nantan City (Kyoto Prefecture).
Fukami-toge Pass is a pass separating Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City and Nantan City, both in Kyoto Prefecture.
Fukami-toge Pass is a pass separating Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City and Nantan City, both in Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 標高440mの国道162号上に位置する峠である。
sen.e: It is 440m above sea level and it is on National Highway 162.
It is the pass located on National Route 162 at an altitude of 440 meters.
It is the pass located on National Route 162 at an altitude of 440 meters.

sen.j: 1946年に深見隧道が掘削され、旧道上に在った深見峠は現在のトンネル峠となった。
sen.e: Due to the building Fukami-suido Tunnel in 1946, Fukami-toge Pass, which had been on the old road, became an unusual pass which runs through a tunnel.
Fukami-toge Pass, which ran on the former road, became a tunnel pass today after Fukami-suido Tunnel was bored in 1946.
Fukami-toge Pass, which ran on the former road, became a tunnel pass today after Fukami-suido Tunnel was bored in 1946.

sen.j: 2001年9月には深見トンネルが開通し、深見隧道も旧道となった歴史がある。
sen.e: After Fukami Tunnel opened and Fukami-suido Tunnel closed in September, 2001, Fukami-toge Pass has run through Fukami Tunnel.
The route switched to run through Fukami Tunnel opened in September, 2001, from Fukami-suido Tunnel.
The route switched to run through Fukami Tunnel opened in September, 2001, from Fukami-suido Tunnel.

sen.j: 古来周山街道の難所として知られており、その名を広く知られていた。
sen.e: Since ancient times, the pass has been famous as a black spot of a major transportation road 'Shuzan-kaido Road'.
Since ancient times, the pass has been famous as a chokepoint of Shuzan-kaido Road.
Since ancient times, the pass has been famous as a chokepoint of Shuzan-kaido Road.

sen.j: 深見トンネル開通までは深見隧道内で離合ができなかったこともあり、国道162号有数の難所だったが、深見トンネル開通に伴い京都府と福井県を結ぶ幹線道路としての機能をしっかりと果たしている。
sen.e: Until 2001, the pass had been famous as the worst black point among many bad sections of National Highway 162 because cars couldn't even pass each other in Fukami-suido Tunnel, however after Fukami Tunnel had opened, the pass has served well as a main road connecting Kyoto Prefecture and Fukui Prefecture.

It was one of the roughest zones in National Route 162 as vehicles couldn't pass each other in the Fukami-suido Tunnel before, but after the Fukami Tunnel was opened, the pass serves well as a main road connecting Kyoto Prefecture and Fukui Prefecture.

sen.j: 2009年現在、深見トンネルが深見峠と呼ばれている。
sen.e: At present (in 2009), 'Fukami Tunnel' is called 'Fukami-toge Pass'.
As of 2009, Fukami Tunnel is called Fukami-toge Pass.
As of 2009, Fukami Tunnel is called Fukami-toge Pass.

sen.j: 旧道であるダート路は峠付近で途絶えており、通行は不可能である。
sen.e: At present the old Fukami-toge Pass (before the opening of Fukami-suido Tunnel) is not paved and closed halfway the pass, it is prohibited to climb to the peak.
The former dirt road is impassable since it is closed halfway around the pass.
The former dirt road is impassable since it is closed halfway around the pass.

sen.j: ただし峠の地蔵が祭られているところまでは行くことは可能であり、旧峠を目的として訪れる人の姿は見ることができる。
sen.e: However, the old pass's Jizo (a stone stature keeping its eye upon the travelers on the pass) is still standing before the closed point, and sometimes climbers, who like watching old passes, are found.
However, it is passable to the place where Toge no Jizo (a stone statue keeping its eye upon the travelers on the pass) is enshrined, people who head for the old pass can be seen.
However, it is passable to the place where Toge no Jizo (a stone statue keeping its eye upon the travelers on the pass) is enshrined, people who head for the old pass can be seen.

sen.j: 深見隧道は両側で完全に封鎖されており、通行は不可能である。
sen.e: At present Fukami-suido Tunnel is closed entirely on the both sides, trespass is prohibited.
Fukami-suido Tunnel is closed entirely on the both sides and impassable.
Fukami-suido Tunnel is closed entirely on the both sides and impassable.

sen.j: 現峠である深見トンネルは片側1車線の確保された快走路であり、かつて難所と呼ばれていたという雰囲気はまるでない。
sen.e: Fukami-toge Pass (present Fukami Tunnel) is two lanes wide and it is easy to drive, it has a mere shadow of its former black spot.
Fukami Tunnel, current Fukami-toge Pass, is easy to drive with two lanes wide and it has no shadow as a chokepoint at all.
